title: Opal

properties.name: description
properties.value: An opal is the lowest level of semi-precious gem. Opals can be cut from uncut opals with level 1 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 15 experience. While cutting opals, the player may accidentally crush an uncut opal into a crushed gem and will receive only 3.8 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make opal jewellery.

Item ID1609

An opal is the lowest level of semi-precious gem. Opals can be cut from uncut opals with level 1 Crafting by using a chisel, granting 15 experience. While cutting opals, the player may accidentally crush an uncut opal into a crushed gem and will receive only 3.8 Crafting experience. When used with a furnace and jewellery mould, they can be used to make opal jewellery.

Cutting chance[edit | edit source]

The chance to successfully cut an opal is: ( level − 1 ) ∗ 122 / 98 + 129 256 {\displaystyle {\frac {({\text{level}}-1)*122/98+129}{256}}} [1]

Based on this probability formula, the price of uncut opal 377, and the price of opal 615, the minimum crafting level to break even or better when flipping opals is 24.

Training[edit | edit source]

Crafting[edit | edit source]

Opals can be crafted into jewellery at a furnace by using a silver bar and the appropriate crafting mould.

Level Input Material Cost[t 1] Output Sell Price Profit / loss XP/Craft XP/Hour Coins/XP
1 Opal Silver bar 707 Opal ring 499 −208 10 6,500 −20.8
11 Opal 615 Opal bolt tips x12 684 69 1.5 4,350 46
16 Opal Silver bar 707 Opal necklace 796 89 35 22,750 2.54
22 Opal Silver bar 707 Opal bracelet 744 37 45 29,250 0.82
27 Opal Silver bar 707 Opal amulet (u) 449 −258 55 35,750 −4.69
27 Opal amulet (u) Ball of wool 489 Opal amulet 435 −54 4 8,000 −13.5
  1. ^ Cost calculated assuming all inputs are purchased from the Grand exchange.

Magic[edit | edit source]

Opal jewellery can be enchanted using Lvl-1 Enchant, requiring level 7 Magic. The spell requires 1 Cosmic rune, 1 Water rune, and the piece of Opal Jewellery that is to be enchanted.

Unenchanted Cost of Unenchanted Jewellery Material Cost[t 1] Enchanted Sell price Profit/Loss XP/Cast XP/Hour Coins/XP
Opal ring 499 615 Ring of pursuit 630 15 17.5 28,000 0.86
Opal necklace 796 912 Dodgy necklace 1,553 641 17.5 28,000 36.63
Opal bracelet 744 860 Expeditious bracelet 1,547 687 17.5 28,000 39.26
Opal amulet 435 551 Amulet of bounty 748 197 17.5 28,000 11.26
  1. ^ Cost calculated using a Staff of water (provides unlimited Water runes) and includes costs of Cosmic runes.
